name: How to Kill the Thumbguy: Aquatic (DLC)
name_original: How to Kill the Thumbguy: Aquatic (DLC)
description:
Welcome to my game

this is the dlc from How to Kill the Thumbguy : original (The Link) and you'll play as a neptune, you'll given a trident and must to kill the thumbguy (enemy) as fast as you can and enter the temple to get a Golden Trident.
